Else-Statement_key2: > If any “ if ”  condition is `false` then an “else” `statement` comes into the picture.
Else-Statement_key5: In this example if a condition is `false`. So, else `statement` will `execute`
Else-Statement_key6: **Example**: Write a program to find the maximum between two numbers.
Else-Statement_key8:
The condition that we given num1> num2  is `false` because num1 (10) is not greater than num2(20), So, if condition is `false` it will go to else condition and print the
num2 is greater than num1.
